title: Never Again
description: Katie Bloom has a great life. Amazing, caring friends, a warm loving family and she is just starting to realise her interest in one of the boys in her class. She's thinking about the future and what she wants later in her life freely, with no concerns whatsoever. Everything is going great in her life.But, as the saying goes, "all good things have to come to an end sometime."Right?
author: Matthew   Telles
